paper.title: Elementary Control Structures
paper.abstract: We define the notion of elementary control structure, and prove that, for fixed sets of names and prime arities, assignment of arities to names, and fixed set of controls, the category of elementary control structures is equivalent to the category of control structures, modulo two mild conditions. We further demonstrate that a mildly special case of closed action calculus forms a calculus for elementary control structures, providing the initial object in the category. Finally, we prove the category of elementary control structures is equivalent to that of fibrational control structures.
